scripts.build-es2016: git remote remove origin && git remote add origin "git@github.com:$TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG.git" && git fetch --quiet origin && git checkout --quiet es2016 && mkdir "out/2016" && cp -R img "out/2016" && ecmarkup --verbose spec.html out/2016/index.html --css out/2016/ecmarkup.css --js out/2016/ecmarkup.js && git checkout --quiet test-travis
scripts.build-master: mkdir out && cp -R img out && ecmarkup --verbose spec.html out/index.html --css out/ecmarkup.css --js out/ecmarkup.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-master
scripts.build-travis: npm run clean && npm run build-master && npm run build-es2016
scripts.watch: npm run clean && mkdir out && cp -R img out && ecmarkup --watch --verbose spec.html out/index.html --css out/ecmarkup.css --js out/ecmarkup.js
